resources.string: Hello! My name is Fatin Nadhirah, and I am a degree student currently studying for Multimedia Computing at MARA University of Technology at Shah Alam, Malaysia. I am in my fifth semester, which marks the second year of my study. I have keen interest in 3D modelling and character design, with a dream of working in a video game company in the future.

First Name: Nur Fatin Nadhirah 
Last Name: Mohd Nazri 
D.O.B: 16th November 1999 
Location: Selangor, Malaysia
